name: Unfairy
description:
An evil dwarf knocked on a fairy's door and stole her wings. The fairy has to get the wings back before the dwarf reaches home.

Get the wings back by jumping on mushrooms and killing the dwarf. You can kill him by collecting wands and shooting at him with magic. If you don't get the wings back before he gets home, you lose.

Controls

Move: A / D ;  Left Stick (Controller)

Jump: Space; A (Xbox-Controller); X (Playstation-Controller)

Shoot: Automatically (stand below him)

 

Sounds: Weloveindies.com
